entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
